| --- |
| Hippocampal cognitive dysfunction |
| BCNU-induced hippocampal cognitive dysfunction |

The two diseases mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. Hippocampal cognitive dysfunction
2. BCNU-induced hippocampal cognitive dysfunction

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities:

The only disease mentioned in the paragraph is "Hippocampal cognitive dysfunction". The phrase "BCNU-induced hippocampal cognitive dysfunction" is not a distinct disease entity, but rather a specification of the cause of the hippocampal cognitive dysfunction. Therefore, it is not included as a separate entity in the table.
